JSHOP2
Class Plan

java.lang.Object
  JSHOP2.Plan

public class Plan
extends java.lang.Object

This class represent a plan as a LinkedList of ground instances of operators.

Version:
1.0.3
Author:
Okhtay Ilghami, http://www.cs.umd.edu/~okhtay
